attributes.name: AiiDA
attributes.description: AiiDA: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science (http://www.aiida.net)

attributes.name: Crystallography Open Database
attributes.description: Open-access collection of crystal structures of organic, inorganic, metal-organics compounds and minerals, excluding biopolymers

attributes.name: Example provider
attributes.description: Provider used for examples, not to be assigned to a real database

attributes.name: The High-Throughput Toolkit
attributes.description: Prefix for implementation-specific identifiers used in the httk implementation at http://httk.org/

attributes.name: Materials Cloud
attributes.description: Materials Cloud: A platform for Open Science built for seamless sharing of resources in computational materials science (http://www.materialscloud.org)

attributes.name: OPTiMaDe implementations and libraries
attributes.description: Prefix for implementation-specific identifiers used in API implementations and libraries provided at https://github.com/Materials-Consortia

attributes.name: Theoretical Crystallography Open Database
attributes.description: Open-access collection of theoretically calculated or refined crystal structures of organic, inorganic, metal-organic compounds and minerals, excluding biopolymers
